name: RoaldDahlTriviaQuiz
0:
”Alexa, play Roald Dahl Trivia!”
”Alexa, let's play Roald Dahl trivia”
”Alexa, open Roald Dahl trivia”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: roald dahl trivia
des:
Roald Dahl's books have delighted children for many years. These trivia questions will sort out the true Dahl experts from all the rest! Test your knowledge of Danny, Matilda, Charlie, James, the BFG, and more. Only the best of the best will get all 10 correct...

Suitable for all ages
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
